title: Twitter : top mentioned hashtags of the Oscars 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of mentions on the Y-axis for 10 different Hashtagss for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets that are presented on the X-axis.
Hashtags #Oscars had the maximum Number of mentions among all 2 groups, and it was for Retweets. The minimum Number of mentions was observed in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT for Tweets.
The maximum Number of mentions for Tweets that was found in Hashtags #Oscars was 928.57 times larger than the minimum Number of mentions observed in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
On average, the Hashtags #Oscars had the highest Number of mentions for all 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. Whereas #OSCARS had the lowest average Number of mentions.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
For Hashtags #Oscars, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions 1987739.0 among the 2 groups and in #WinnerIsDJT, Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions 855.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of mentions on the Y-axis for 10 different Hashtagss for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets that are presented on the X-axis.
Hashtags #Oscars had the maximum Number of mentions among all 2 groups, and it was for Retweets. The minimum Number of mentions was observed in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT for Tweets.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Hashtagss on X-axis for 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of mentions.
Out of all 2 groups, Retweets had the highest Number of mentions for Hashtags #Oscars and Tweets had the lowest Number of mentions for Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
For Hashtags #Oscars, Tweets had the highest Number of mentions among all 10 Hashtagss and it has the lowest Number of mentions in Hashtags #WinnerIsDJT.
There is a gap of 793070.0 between the highest and lowest Number of mentions found for Tweets in Hashtags #Oscars and #WinnerIsDJT.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of mentions was found in case of Tweets.
On average, the Hashtags #Oscars had the highest Number of mentions for all 2 groups Tweets, and Retweets. Whereas #OSCARS had the lowest average Number of mentions.
